title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 2.1 - Form of regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 2.1 - Form of regulations

State Regulations

All regulations shall be signed by the superintendent, shall be dated as of date of signature, should have short descriptive titles indicating the subject matter to which they relate, and should cite the section or sections of the Insurance Law which authorize their issuance. A regulation which modifies or supersedes a prior regulation should refer to the regulation or regulations so modified or superseded. They are to take effect in accordance with the applicable provisions of the State Administrative Procedure Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11

2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
